# dplyr In a Nutsehll

mtcars %*%
    

p_funs(dplyr)

group_by
filter

summarise 

order_by
desc



mtcars2 <- tbl_df(mtcars)

filter(mtcars2, cyl == 8)
select(mtcars2, mpg, cyl, hp:vs)
arrange(mtcars2, cyl, disp)
mutate(mtcars2, displ_l = disp / 61.0237)
summarise(mtcars2, mean(disp))
summarise(group_by(mtcars2, cyl), m=mean(disp), m+1)

"+" <- %.%
mtcars2 %.%
    group_by(cyl) %.%
    summarise(md=mean(disp), mh=mean(hp), mdh=mean(disp + hp))


mtcars2 %.%
    group_by(cyl) %.%
    summarise(md=mean(disp), mh=mean(hp), mdh=mean(disp + hp)) %.%
    arrange(-md)
